alert.note: Alert for Bladen; Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 7:26PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Bladen and Robeson Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 722 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking an area of showers capable of producing gusty winds over Maxton, or near Laurinburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lumberton, Red Springs, Pembroke, Fairmont, Maxton, St. Pauls, Rowland, Boardman, Rex, Bladen Community College, Ammon, Butters, South Of The Border, Hestertown, Shannon, Buie, Robeson Community College, Wakulla, White Oak and Elrod. This includes Interstate 95 in North Carolina between mile markers 1 and 38. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
